summary: This module defines a set of custom TrainerCallback classes that extend the Hugging Face Trainer to add functionality such as logging model-generated completions to experiment tracking services, displaying live training progress with Rich, synchronizing a target model with a reference model after each step, and computing a win‑rate metric by comparing generated responses against a reference using a pairwise judge. It also includes a helper routine for generating completions from prompts.
business_intent: Enable developers to monitor, evaluate, and manage language model fine‑tuning more effectively by providing automated logging, real‑time visual feedback, model version syncing, and quantitative win‑rate assessment during training.
